General_Description: '''Paint the Ocean Blue''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens|Athenian]] [[trireme]]s pose too great a threat to [[Sparta]]'s naval forces."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra destroyed Athenian triremes all over [[Greece]], and was rewarded for doing so.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Dying Sea]] and [[Waters of Fate]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
